Reviews.Title: good laptop - working as expected
Reviews.Author: AmitM
Reviews.Content: Nice product. Works fine so far. good speakers. adapter gets very hot, more than many others I have seen. keyboard is a bit tacky.

Reviews.Title: great computer terrable OS
Reviews.Author: KLD42
Reviews.Content: This computer has plenty of power for all your needs. For the money it is a real bargan. The look and feel are great. My only complaint is the OS. Windows crashed three times in the first two days. I replaced the Windows OS with Opensuse Linux. With the Linux OS everything works perfictly. It is a shame to see such a fantastic machine shipped with a poor OS

Reviews.Title: Love Toshiba!
Reviews.Author: A. Kuhlmann
Reviews.Content: My last Toshiba laptop lasted me over 5 years and when the hard drive started failing i decided to buy a new one. Well my last one i payed $900, this one i payed under $400 and it already runs BETTER than my orignial. The fact that it's not actually run on POS Vista really helps...but it runs fast and does everything i need it to. Very happy especially considering what i payed for it. It's also nice to look at which is a bonus :)

Reviews.Title: Love our laptops
Reviews.Author: Joy Harvey "Joy H"
Reviews.Content: 4th toshiba satellite for us- easy keyboard placement, ease of use, styling, durable has held up well easy to update with additional memory if needed. Won't buy another brand. If kids using, be careful with hinges, can become loose with excessive wear, but was easily repaired locally. Still would choose for kids andadults alike. Best for price on the market.Great item

Reviews.Title: good laptop for less money
Reviews.Author: Deborah L Martin
Reviews.Content: This has become my only computer since I have decided to move everything to the laptop from my desktop computer. I thought I could not live without my desktop but now I love using this laptop.  It travels with me as I visit my grandchildren so I have all my information with me at all times.

Reviews.Title: Can't live without it
Reviews.Author: A. VANDENLANGENBERG
Reviews.Content: This is my first laptop. I've had it for about a month. I had a few friends suggest the Toshiba brand for laptops. I'm told Toshibas hold up well to the wear and tear of travelling with a laptop. I was very happy with the price and haven't had any problems with the computer. The size is perfect and it's pretty lightweight. It's comfortable to use and the battery lasts a long time. I don't know how I lived without a laptop and am very happy with my choice. I had been mulling it over forever.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba laptop
Reviews.Author: Kathy Smith
Reviews.Content: My daughter will be using it and really likes it. She will use it for school projects, etc. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: horrible computer
Reviews.Author: guven nuzun
Reviews.Content: not working well.you cant watch video...handling bad in all aspect.. probably nit good idea to buy computer from amazon...they should not sell computer ..worse is now i cant return but i cant use this useless computer as well.

Reviews.Title: forget the jerk pushing linux
Reviews.Author: KG
Reviews.Content: one guy is complaining about the os on all computers and saying linux is superior..must be a rep for linux

Reviews.Title: SHOULD HAVE BOUGHT AN APPLE
Reviews.Author: Chrissi
Reviews.Content: I have had to spend several hundred dollars for Tech Support for viruses even though I have excellent security software.However, Toshiba's Tech Support out shines DELL's technicians by a long shot. Should have spent the extra money and bought an Apple!
